module: Module-level comment: The `altera_up_video_alpha_blender_simple` module blends two RGB data sets based on an alpha or control bit. It inputs 30-bit `background_data` and 40-bit `foreground_data`, the latter containing a control bit to determine output selection. Outputs `new_red`, `new_green`, `new_blue` are determined using bitwise operations to selectively blend foreground or background RGB values contingent on the control bit status, directly encoding the color blend logic within the assign statements.
